吴说区块链: FDUSD 增发或与今日币安上线两款 launchpool 项目有关，均给 FDUSD 池分配了 5%的额度。币安页面显示，当前 Sei 项目 FDUSD 池质押了约 3 千万枚 FDUSD，Cyber​​Connect 项目 FDUSD 池质押了1883 万枚 FDUSD，总计占 FDUSD 供应总量的 47%。 https://launchpad.binance.com/en/launchpool/CYBER_FDUSD & https://launchpad.binance.com/en/launchpool/SEI_FDUSD

FS Insight: The only consistent period of weakness for #Bitcoin occurs from mid-August through September. It's important to remember that seasonality is an imperfect measure of risk, so it should be taken with a grain of salt.

olimpio: There's a risk of a black swan event in DeFi. As per Defillama, if CRV drops below $0.37, there's 300M CRV to liquidate in Aave -most from Curve's founder The problem? There's not a single Exchange or DeFi protocol where one can sell such a large CRV amount. Risks explained 🧵

entry.summary: Re @RNR_0 Technically it’s not a probability of 1/6. If 5/6 chambers are empty then bullet will be heavier. So when you spin it it’s more likely to not be at the top hole, because gravity.

entry.summary: Re ✔️结合自己判断的未来有可能有机会的方向，或者是你认知自己有天赋和才能的方向，去做一些「副业」，在选择副业上需确定是随着时间精力的投入，能够带来复利效应的事业。 万事开头难，不建议起步尝试成本太高的副业，大环境不好的情况下副业也会很卷，大多数普通人都没有承受高成本创业失败的资本。 🙁
